Changelog

v1.0.1 (2022/04/05)
- Fixed sound effects

v1.0.2 (2022/04/05)
- Fixed game freezing bug

v1.0.3 (2022/04/08)
- Fixed resetting air pressure
- Fixed sound effects
- Fixed and enabled leaderboard (was disabled in the previous versions due to a CORS problem)
- Fixed obstacle colliders
- Fixed tutorial not skippable and added retry button
- Minor game balancing adjustments
